branchCategory.name: Miniature
branchCategory.description: The LEPY is a rod type electric actuator with a miniature form factor, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! The series includes two body sizes with inline mounted motors. Maximum stroke is 75mm, and maximum work load is 2 kg, or 50N pushing force depending on the application.

branchItem.name: LEPY, Electric Actuator Miniature Rod Type, Step Motor (Servo/24VDC)
branchItem.description: The LEPY is a rod type electric actuator with a miniature form factor, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! The series includes two body sizes with inline mounted motors. Maximum stroke is 75mm, and maximum work load is 2 kg, or 50N pushing force depending on the application.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body sizes: 6, 10 <LI>Strokes: 25, 50, and 75 mm <LI>Mounting : Side ( through or tapped), bottom tapped, axial tapped <LI>Motor cable entry selectable from 4 directions <LI>Basic and compact motor sizes available for size 10
</LI></UL>
